[Big Side Pockets & Fashion Prints] Women athletic shorts provide large side pockets for cards and smartphone with fashion prints.
[Sweat-Wicking Fabric] The quick-dry design supports sweat wicking capability and keeps the shorts breathable. No need to worry about the sweat line problem.
[High Waist & Tummy Control] The product provides elasticity and gentle compression to shape your curve.
[Opaque & Stretchy] The fabric offers great privacy and maximizes your stretch with comfort; The flat-edge design prevents curling.
[Fit for Multiple Occasions] The product is great for casual or workout including yoga, biking, jogging, weightlifting, volleyball, etc.

2 in 1 design：These mens workout clothes outer layer are made of mesh fabric, breathable and lightweight, moisture wicking.Inner layer compression tight shorts 80% polyester 20% Spandex, provide support for the thigh muscles and prevent friction.These gym clothes for men is easy to clean and can maintain its shape after multiple washings.
Multifunctional Design：These Mens athletic shorts with towel loop attached under the left waistband.Allows you to hang the towel during exercise more conveniently. Inner layer have deep phone pocket.Outer layer have two side pockets and one Invisible zipperd pocket.
Elastic Waistband:These Gym shorts for men with elastic waistband constructed for greater waist comfort,internal drawstrings easy to adjust,supports firmness, not easy to fall off during exercise.
Fit All Occasion:These workout shorts men can suitable basketball,football,volleyball,tennis,baseball,yoga,exercise training,cycling,running,hiking,jogging,boxing and so on.
About Size:These mens running shorts can provide you with good Good breathability, reduce friction during exercise.And there are different colors and sizes of men’s sports clothing for you to choose,please check the size chart in picture before buying.

CELL PHONE POCKET

Stylish towel ring design,easy access to towels at any time,providing comfortable service.

HIDDEN SIDE ZIPPER

This pocket can store items such as cards,keys,headphones,etc.,and it is not easy to lose important items.

  2. Mens lightweight 2 piece sweatsuits sets can pair with a sports shoes for athletic sports in spring, summer, and autumn, or you can wear them separately.
  3. Perfect for home, sleeping, daily casual, sports, gym, running, yoga, party, exercise, fitness, cocktail, workout or traveling time in every season from winter to spring.

Elastic closure
Pleated Athletic Skirt ► This high waisted skorts activewear womens designed pleated hem at the back,the flowing looks make you more fashion during workout. Cheer mini skirt help you enjoy the beauty while exercising.
With 3 Pockets ► 3 pockets in this golf skirt with shorts can play different roles.Pockets on the leg to fit tennis balls and also secure to store essentials like phone,card etc… Another back waistband zipper pocket convenience for you to hold keys, coins and other necessary.
Built-in Short Liner ► Our women athletic tennis skirt skort has two layers, skirt outer and shorts inner, the inner short can provide you with extra coverage, enhances your range of motion, not see through when you’ve been sweating on the court.
Wide Elastic Waistband ► The sports pleated skirts with shorts is elastic and comfortable to wear, which can hide stomach mildly and stay in place, not roll down when you do sport. Provides a comfortable natural fit with plenty of coverage while bending and stretching.
Soft Comfort Material ► This golf skorts activewear is made of polyester and spandex. Breathable and stretchy fabric ideal for tennis, golf, running,athletics, cycling, hiking and everyday casual wear. It also figure flattering and useful for all seasons and various occasions.








Built in Shorts & Two Side Pockets

  • Two pockets on both sides,which allow you to take your essential items.

Wide Elastic Waistband

  • Hide stomach mildly and stay in place.

Back Zipper Pocket & Pleated design

  • The pocket convenience for you to hold keys,cards and other necessary.
  • Attractive and comfortable stacking pleated design.

BALENNZ Men’s Athletic Shorts

New Collections for Men Performance Workout Sense!

MENS WORKOUT SHORTS

MENS WORKOUT SHORTS

BOYS ACTIVEWEAR

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.84 x 8.35 x 1.42 inches; 11.99 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 30, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08C29X77C

Machine Wash
BOOST PERFORMANCE: We use soft fabric to bring you sports shorts for men that offer just the right balance of softness, breathability, and stretchiness to keep you comfortable throughout your workouts
10-INCH INSEAM: Whether you’re working out at the gym or running on the track, our men’s gym shorts have you covered. They are suitable for all your sports and workout activities including gym, cycling, running, basketball, football, tennis and more
POCKETS ON BOTH SIDES: Thanks to the hand pockets, you can easily carry your wallet, smartphone, and other small accessories when working out or traveling. These mens athletic shorts can be paired up with other clothing to create your own look
BREATHABLE & QUICK DRYING: Our breathable sports shorts for men wick moisture away from the skin while being gentle and quick-drying so you can workout, train and push your limits while staying comfortable and feeling dry
GET THE RIGHT FIT: Our men’s workout shorts feature an encased elastic waistband which coupled with the inner drawcord makes sure you get the perfect fit every time. Our shorts stay comfortably in place whether running or training without sliding up or down








Long Sleeve Tee Shirts for Men Moisture Wicking Quick Dry
Moisture Wicking Golf Shirt Quick Dry Golf Polos for Men
Athletic Women’s Gym Performance T Shirts Workout Shirts
Moisture Wicking Quick Dry Workout Shirts for Women
Quick Dry Workout Shirts for Men Athletic T Shirts
Moisture Wicking Quick Dry Athletic Men’s Gym T Shirts
Material Polyester Polyester and Spandex Polyester Polyester Polyester Polyester
Size Option S-3XL S-3XL S-2XL S-2XL S-3XL S-3XL

Support Your Performance While Staying Comfortable With Men’s Activewear Shorts

Whether you’re working out or just playing sports, you need clothes that can keep up with your active lifestyle. This is why we designed our athletic shorts for men to provide you with a simple and fashion-forward way to stay comfortable and dry throughout the day to help you take your performance to the next level.

We made our moisture-wicking running shorts to make your daily workout routine easier and comfier. This is why we use carefully chosen materials that offer just the right balance between breathability and comfort with a fashion-forward yet simple design so you can slip these workout shorts on and head out knowing you’ll look just as good as you feel.

The Perfect Fit

These shorts have an adjustable drawstring and elastic closure that make sure they stay firmly and comfortably in place all day. You can easily adjust the tightness for a custom fit that’s not too tight or loose so you can move around and stretch without worry.

Side Pockets

Our mens gym shorts are designed with 2 side pockets that provide you with all the storage space you need to keep your keys, wallet, smartphones, and other accessories safe and within arm’s reach whether at home or on the go.

Easy To Maintain

The men’s athletic shorts are machine washable and quick-drying to take the hassle out of keeping them clean. Simply machine wash with cold water without using bleach or fabric softener and tumble dry on low – that’s it.

Read more

Made For Daily Use

Besides being perfect for sports and workouts, our breathable shorts for men with pockets are suitable to wear even when lounging around your home, on the go, parties and any other occasion you have in mind making them ideal for daily wear.

Read more

Enjoy A Better Workout Experience

No athletic wardrobe is complete without a comfortable pair of workout shorts. We designed our quick-drying sports shorts to provide just the right fit for any activity you have in mind to give you the support you need to keep pushing your limits.

Our men’s athletic shorts are made for people that don’t want to settle. They wick away moisture from the skin to stay cool and dry throughout the day which coupled with their lightweight and comfortable feel make them perfect for workouts, basketball, football, tennis, baseball, badminton, boxing, cycling, running, hiking, and much more.

4.5
Price: $38.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:08 UTC – Details)
